title: The home to envy!
posting_body: Text 5227A to my cell for more information!
The Penthouse Collection
The  Penthouses proudly hold claim to the highest residential views in Dallas.
Views are just the beginning, as The Penthouses has much more to offer in amenities, design, and service.
EXCLUSIVE PENTHOUSE SERVICES
Penthouse Residents enjoy exclusive access to curated services and events in addition to the suite of standard offerings provided to all National residents.
Dedicated Concierge
Daily Tea and Coffee Service Paired with the Day’s Newspaper
Partnership with The Botanical Mix
Thompson Spa Membership
Reservations to Thompson’s  Carefully Curated Roster of Live Events
Partnership with Thompson Dallas
Hardwood Flooring throughout entire unit
Thermador Gas Stove and Appliances
Gas Fireplace with Custom Mantle
Walk-In Showers with Built in Benches and Glass Encloses
Large Free Standing Soaking Tubs
Spacious Walk-In Closets with Wood Shelving
Custom Framed Mirrors at Vanity
Hospitality Bar with Wine Fridge and Ice Maker
Remote Control Blackout Shades in Bedrooms
Spacious Butler Pantry with Secondary Entrance
